casename: Sie Choon Poh trading as Image Galaxy v Amara Hotel Properties Pte Ltd
counsel: Navinder Singh (Navin & Co) for the plaintiff; Adeline Chong and Rajendran Kumarasan (Harry Elias & Partnership) for the defendants
